What are your business advantages of using 1GARD promotion program?

Includes internet based & non internet based services we provide.
Market positioning.
Press-releasees.

If you intend to extend your company's market share you must realize the present position of it. Strong Market Positioning available by your pass through the registration. Keep it in reserve and let business world know why your positions are unique. This promotion program allows to identify what your products and services are & where they are exactly.

The info you placed in system is searchable for all users and members of the 1GARD . 1GARD makes this info available even for its clients who are using non Internet services.

For example: Our client have requested to find out the certain services in the certain market segment, in the certain region for business relationsship. First of all we provide them with info which satisfy the requirements. Well positioned companies or organizations will take a place in the first lines of the report.

Also your company will have an opportunity to post the Press-releasees trough this promotion program. Strict requirement: All of them must be important news related with yours activity & business. They will be placed in 1GARD News Room & will be searchable for audience by keywords.

Most interesting of them will be linked to 1GARD head lines (on decision of the editorial board).

All info is searchable by major search engines (alta vista, infoseek etc.)
 Your news can take a place in NEWS ROOM
